examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi I recently signed up to canva just to try it out iv had a busy month and ddnt remember to cancel the subscription I’m not working due to the pandemic and can’t afford this subscription , as I haven’t used it I’d like my money back and the subscription stopped ASAP

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Pleas can you stop taking money out of my bank - I do not give permission for this . I have not signed up to a premium service and I would like all of the money you have taken without my permission returned to me. I have never used this service

Refund request reason: I do not use Canva Pro program any more. 
I thought that my subscriptions is stopped, because I did not see it in Apple account, 
But i did not check in the Canva account. 
Funds were just taken from CC. Please do a refund. 
I stopped all subscriptions. 
Thank you.

Refund request reason: I keep taking my PayPal off and it keeps adding it back. I want service to cease and I want all my money back from December, Jan.. and I want CHARGES TO STOP!!!!!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had cancelled my subscription in December but  my credit card is  debited this month. I need refund of my fee as i have stopped using this app

What is your problem with ?: Other Describe the problem .: Please cancel my subscription and stop withdrawing money from my card without my consent !!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: We were billed & never gave you guys permission to do so - we want to be refunded - we want this to stop immediately

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to stop this app and I need my money refunded back to my account. At least 2 charges this month was taken out my account and my account will overdraft

Describe your issue: I just received notice I am going to be charged for a subscription I don’t want. I signed up for the trial but didn’t use it enough to warrant a subscription. How do I stop this?!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have cancelled this subscription 3 or 4 times, and it is still being charged on my account. I do not want this. I did not sign up for it. Please stop charging my card for it.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have cancelled my subscription already but it still charges my card. Last December and just yesterday. How can I stop this please?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I already canceled my membership and received a refund and I STILL CONTINUE TO GET BILLED PLEASE STOP BILLING ME!!!!!!!!

Jaki rodzaj problemu zgłaszasz?: Inne

Opisz problem: I forgot to stop the next month of canva pro. I  used it by 1 free month. I send you my ask for stopping this product without charging me. I would be very grateful for return of money.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have Emailed multiple times reporting that I I’m being charged for a canvas subscription I do not use Canva and canceled my subscription along time ago. My PayPal is still being charged. I have requested a refund and for it to stop and I am still being charged. Please have someone contact me ASAP i’m being charged for a canvas subscription I do not use Canva and canceled my subscription along time ago. My PayPal is still being charged. I have requested a refund and for it to stop and I am still being charged. Please have someone contact me ASAP as this is the 8th time i have Been wrongfully charged to my paypal. I DO NOT have a canva account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I wasn’t aware I was still paying for Canva and would like a refund as I stopped using this platform a while ago

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Dear Canva team, I tried Canva for free for one month And afterwards I didn't stopped the subscription because  i thought it stops automatically or i will be asked about continuing. I don't want to use Canva, and i haven't used it feven once from the moment i bought it (i didn't know that i did) and i would like to get <NAME> euros back to my bank account  LT<NUMBER>MARIJA DAUBARAITE as soon as possible. Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have asked repeatedly to be refunded and not charged for billing . I have been charged anyway. Please kindly refund as soon as possible and please stop charging my card

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I forgot about my subscribtion, and it automaticly charged me, please, i would like to have my money back if possible and I would like to stop the subscribtion.

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: How do I stop my subscription? I cannot afford it anymore

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my canva subscription a while ago. Unfortunately I'm still getting invoices from you. Please return my money and stop charging me.  Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Stop attempting to draft from my debit card. I already cancelled my subscription.
What do you need help with?: Please stop charging my credit card. I canceled my canva pro for than 6 months. Please be fair

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: This is the 2/3rd time I’ve had to ask for my refund. Stop taking money from me! I’m not with Canva premium.

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I have stopped my trial premium subscription but I see you sent me an invoice, I do not understand. Is it possible to stop it and not take me please? Thank you in advance for what you can do. Sincerely, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I chose for Canva Pro free trial period. However, I want to stop it before it becomes paying (9 February). If I stop it now, will the Pro version stop immediately or only after the trial period? Or do I need to wait until 8 February to cancel it?

Номер счета: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not have any active subscription, it is stated in my Apple ID and here, but I've got money withdrawal tloday (899 rub.). I did not approve that, it is illegal. Please, stop withdrawing money from my account and cancel this payment, I did not order any services, I do not need your subscription! I, as I customer, should have sucg difficulties with it, just stop stealing my money!

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: You didn't give me the time to stop using Canva temporarily and automatically charged me for a subscription. I only use canva once a year. Please cancel this subscription and refund the charged cost. <NAME> Vanroose

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Another 12 euros has been charged even though I canceled this for a long time. Please refund my money and stop charging it. Send me for further contact<EMAIL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have canceled my canva pro subscription on both my accounts and canceled it through the app store and paypal, but i continue to receive charges. I would like to be refunded for the last several months since I canceled my subsciption, and to have charges permanently stopped.

Thank you for your assistance.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I have been charged for several months, and I have no active subscription !!! Please what's going on! Stop charging me and return the money

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: STOP BILLING ME! I am no longer interested in your app. As i had intimated, I requested an end to my subscription a while ago. Yet, you keep charging my card. I find that unacceptable!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am being charged for a Pro subscription. I already got Canva Pro. I do not how to stop this. Thank you

What kind of problem? : Other description of your problem: Hi I forget stopping suscribe your canva app so that I was charged for 340NTD Please help me for the refunding My canva account is<EMAIL> Thanks

What do you need help with?: I am being billed for canva and i havent used it in two years can you stop this billing and refund the relevant charges
<NAME> anthony Ltd

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I do not use the platform and I have just seen that I have been debited on my card .. It was an error .. could I have the refund please? I just got billed .. Thanks for your understanding .. Could you stop my subscription too please?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi why is it that you keep on charging even though I stopped my trial? I was charged almost $125 good thing my bank considered it as a fraud transaction.

Describe your issue: I deleted my account, but I was billed. Please stop billing me. I want a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I no longer have a subscription (stopped it months ago), yet you continue to charge me on a monthly basis.  Please STOP taking money from my account.
Can someone contact me to discuss.
Thanks,
<NAME> 
<NUMBER>

Describe your issue: I am still get billed for Canva per month I have emailed to request to stop billing me. I did it as soon as my free trial was approaching to an end. PLEASE stop billing me. I'm not interested

Describe your issue: Hi there, I thought I stopped my premium subscription but I’m still being charged €11.99 a month

Describe your issue: Can you please cancel my subscription and refund my amount. I forgot to stop my subscription. Can you please cancel it.
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem you are facing: I want to stop having Canva paid and not withdraw the amount from the account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have been charged monthly since sept without knowing or my approval. I did not sign up and did not authourize these charges. I dididnt catch it till today. and or confirm my account you can see i do not use his site. Please refund in full and stop charing my account.

Describe your issue: Please stop the automatic payment as my account was never activated, and no subscription is reflected in my account.
Describe the issue: Stop charging my credit card. I demand a refund

Describe your issue: I was charged. I have already canceled. I need a stop payment ASAP

King Regards, <NAME> Barros
